_comment: English translations for TypeScript Complete Course (TypeScriptCourseSeeder)

template.title: TypeScript完全コース
template.description: JavaScript経験者向けTypeScriptコース。10週間で型システムの基礎から、高度な型操作、実践的なフレームワーク連携まで学習します。

TypeScript完全コース.title: TypeScript Complete Course
TypeScript完全コース.description: TypeScript course for JavaScript developers. Learn from type system fundamentals to advanced type manipulation and practical framework integration over 10 weeks.

TypeScript基礎.title: TypeScript Complete Course
TypeScript基礎.description: TypeScript course for JavaScript developers. Learn from type system fundamentals to advanced type manipulation and practical framework integration over 10 weeks.

TypeScript基礎.title: TypeScript Fundamentals
TypeScript基礎.description: Environment setup, basic types, interfaces, function typing

高度な型.title: Advanced Types
高度な型.description: Union types, Intersection types, Generics, Utility types, Type guards
deliverables: Implement type-safe code with type guards

オブジェクト指向とデコレータ.title: Object-Oriented Programming and Decorators
オブジェクト指向とデコレータ.description: Classes, inheritance, access modifiers, abstract classes, decorators, Namespace

実践的なTypeScript.title: Practical TypeScript
実践的なTypeScript.description: React + TypeScript, Node.js + TypeScript, testing, best practices

第1週：TypeScriptとは？環境構築.title: Week 1: What is TypeScript? Environment Setup

TypeScriptとは？.title: What is TypeScript?
TypeScriptとは？.content: Static typing, JS superset, IDE support. TS vs JS. Used in Angular, React, Vue, Node.

TypeScript環境構築.title: TypeScript Environment Setup
TypeScript環境構築.content: npm install typescript, tsc --init, tsc -w, ts-node.

tsconfig.json.title: tsconfig.json
tsconfig.json.content: target, module, outDir, rootDir, strict, sourceMap, include/exclude.

第2週：基本的な型.title: Week 2: Basic Types
第2週：基本的な型.description: Primitive types, arrays, tuples, Enum, Any, Unknown

プリミティブ型.title: Primitive Types
プリミティブ型.content: string, number, boolean. Type inference. null, undefined. Literal types, type alias.

配列とタプル.title: Arrays and Tuples
配列とタプル.content: number[], Array<T>. Tuples [string, number]. Labeled tuple. Rest in tuple.

Enum、Any、Unknown、Never.title: Enum, Any, Unknown, Never
Enum、Any、Unknown、Never.content: enum, const enum. any (avoid), unknown (safe). never, void.

第3週：関数とインターフェース.title: Week 3: Functions and Interfaces
第3週：関数とインターフェース.description: Function typing, optional parameters, interfaces, type aliases

関数の型付け.title: Function Typing
関数の型付け.content: Params and return types. Optional, default, rest. Function type. Overloads.

インターフェース.title: Interfaces
インターフェース.content: interface, optional, readonly. extends. SearchFunc, index signature.

InterfaceとType Aliasの違い.title: Interface vs Type Alias
InterfaceとType Aliasの違い.content: Interface: extensible, declaration merge. Type: union, tuple, complex types.

第4週：Union型とIntersection型.title: Week 4: Union Types and Intersection Types
第4週：Union型とIntersection型.description: Union types, Intersection types, type guards, Type Assertion

Union型とIntersection型.title: Union and Intersection Types
Union型とIntersection型.content: A | B (either), A & B (both). Discriminated union.

型ガード.title: Type Guards
型ガード.content: typeof, instanceof, in. Custom 'pet is Fish'. Discriminated union with kind.

Type Assertion（型アサーション）.title: Type Assertion
Type Assertion（型アサーション）.content: as HTMLElement. Non-null !. as const. Prefer type guards.

第5週：ジェネリクス.title: Week 5: Generics
第5週：ジェネリクス.description: Generic functions, generic classes, constraints, default types

ジェネリック関数.title: Generic Functions
ジェネリック関数.content: function identity<T>(arg: T): T. Multiple type params. Generic interface.

ジェネリック制約とデフォルト型.title: Generic Constraints and Defaults
ジェネリック制約とデフォルト型.content: T extends HasLength. keyof. Default type param. merge<T,U>.

第6週：ユーティリティ型とMapped Types.title: Week 6: Utility Types and Mapped Types
第6週：ユーティリティ型とMapped Types.description: Partial, Required, Readonly, Pick, Omit, Record, Mapped Types

ユーティリティ型.title: Utility Types
ユーティリティ型.content: Partial, Required, Readonly, Pick, Omit, Record. Exclude, Extract, NonNullable, ReturnType, Parameters.

Mapped Types.title: Mapped Types
Mapped Types.content: [P in keyof T]?: T[P]. Nullable<T>. Key remapping with as.

Conditional Types.title: Conditional Types
Conditional Types.content: T extends U ? X : Y. infer. DeepReadonly. Distributive conditional.

第7週：クラスとOOP.title: Week 7: Classes and OOP
第7週：クラスとOOP.description: Classes, inheritance, access modifiers, abstract classes, implements

クラスの基本.title: Class Basics
クラスの基本.content: class, constructor, property shorthand. get/set. static. readonly.

継承と抽象クラス.title: Inheritance and Abstract Class
継承と抽象クラス.content: extends, super. abstract class, abstract method. implements (interface).

デコレータ.title: Decorators
デコレータ.content: Class, method, property, param decorators. experimentalDecorators. Decorator factory.

モジュールとNamespace.title: Modules and Namespace
モジュールとNamespace.content: export/import, default. namespace (legacy). import type. Re-export.

第9週：React/Vue + TypeScript.title: Week 9: React/Vue + TypeScript
第9週：React/Vue + TypeScript.description: Using TypeScript with React/Vue, component typing

React + TypeScript.title: React + TypeScript
React + TypeScript.content: FC<Props>, useState<T>, useRef<T>, useReducer. Custom hooks. Event types.

Vue 3 + TypeScript.title: Vue 3 + TypeScript
Vue 3 + TypeScript.content: defineComponent, PropType. ref, computed. Script setup, defineProps, defineEmits.

第10週：Node.js + TypeScript、テスト、ベストプラクティス.title: Week 10: Node.js + TypeScript, Testing, Best Practices
第10週：Node.js + TypeScript、テスト、ベストプラクティス.description: Express + TypeScript, Jest, ESLint, best practices

Express + TypeScript.title: Express + TypeScript
Express + TypeScript.content: Request<{id}>, Response. Typed body, middleware, error handler.

Jest + TypeScript.title: Jest + TypeScript
Jest + TypeScript.content: ts-jest, describe/it. Mock with jest.MockedFunction. Typed tests.

TypeScriptベストプラクティス.title: TypeScript Best Practices
TypeScriptベストプラクティス.content: Prefer inference, avoid any, strict mode, type guards, utility types, path alias, ESLint.
